description:
The second eldest one (14) among girls under Willem`s care.
Compatible with using "dug weapon", current wielder of Valgulious, one of the special greatswords used by Heroes of the past. The name of the sword is now also a part of her own name.
Loud and playful girl. Always joking around, especially loves teasing Chtholly.
name: Ithea Myse Valgulious
